SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Adresse
This class represents an address, containing details such as street, city, state, postal code, and country.
AnzahlException
An exception thrown when there is an insufficient quantity of an article in stock.
Artikel
This class represents an article in the shop inventory system, containing details such as the article number, description, stock, price, and whether it is a mass article.
Artikelhistory
This class represents the history of an article, capturing the date, article details, and total quantity involved.
Artikelnamenichtgefunden
Exception thrown when a requested article name is not found.
Artikelnichtgefunden
Exception thrown when a requested article number is not found.
ArtikelVerwaltung
Manages the articles in the EShop, including adding, updates, searching, removing articles , and throwing specific exceptions related to article management.
Authentication
The Authentication class handles the creation of login and registration scenes for the application.
BestandException
Exception thrown when a change in stock does not meet packaging size requirements.
Client
 
Cui
The Cui class manages the Command-line User Interface (CUI) for an EShop application.
CustomerSection
The CustomerSection class is responsible for managing and displaying the UI components related to the customer section of the application.
EmployeeSection
The EmployeeSection class is responsible for managing and displaying the UI components related to the Employee section of the application.
EShop
this class is used to Manage user interface interactions with various management classes of the EShop.
EshopServer
EshopServer class manages the server-side operations of eshop .
Event
This class Represents an event in the e-shop system, capturing operations performed by a customer or employee on an article.
FalscheLoginDaten
Exception thrown when incorrect login credentials are provided.
FilePersistenceManager
Manages reading from and writing to files for entities like Nutzer, Artikel, and Event.
Gui
The Gui class represents the graphical user interface for the eshop.
GuiClient
 
Kunde
This class represents a customer in the Eshop system, extending the Nutzer class.
Main
 
MainLayout
The MainLayout class serves as the base class for the application's main layout and functionality.
Massenartikel
This class represents a mass article in the shop inventory system, extending the Artikel class to include additional details for mass article such as the package size.
MassengutException
Exception thrown when the quantity of article is not divisible by the packaging size.
Mitarbeiter
This class represents an employee in the Eshop system, extending the Nutzer class.
Nutzer
This class represents a user in the Eshop system, containing details such as user number, name, username, and password.
NutzernameExistiertBereits
Exception thrown when attempting to register a user with a username that already exists.
PackungsGrosseException
Exception thrown when the quantity is not a multiple of the packaging size for an article.
PersistenceManager
Interface for managing persistence operations, such as reading from and writing to file.
PersonenVerwaltung
Manages users (customers and employees) in the Eshop system.
Plzexception
Exception thrown when an invalid postal code (PLZ) is encountered.
Rechnung
This class Represents an invoice containing the date of the transaction, total price, and customer details.
ServerRequest
 
VerlaufVerwaltung
Manages operations and history related to articles , including loading, sorting, saving events, and filtering operations based on specific criteria.
Warenkorb
This class represents a shopping cart that contains a list of items from the Eshop selected by the customer.
WarenkorbArtikel
This class Represents an item in the shopping cart, consisting of an article, quantity added to the cart , and price per piece.
WarenkorbVerwaltung
Manages the shopping cart operations for customers.
